question:
Consider the following statements about the Inclusive Development Index:
  1. It has been designed as an alternative to GDP for measuring economic performance
  2. It is published by the World Bank
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. Inclusive Development Index has been designed as an alternative to GDP for measuring economic performance. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u> because the Index is published by the World Economic Forum. In the recent released Index, India has been ranked 62 out of 74 emerging economies. The index focuses on the living standards of people and future-proofing of economies. The report shows that roughly there has been 2.3% improvement in the overall five-year trend of the IDI for India.
